alert.note: Alert for Ellis (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 14 at 12:00PM CDT until July 14 at 12:45PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Dodge City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Ellis County in central Kansas... * Until 1245 PM CDT. * At 1159 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles south of Plainville, or 13 miles northwest of Emmeram, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Ellis County. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
